readers.type: Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Content.DictionaryReader`2[[System.String, mscorlib, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b77a5c561934e089],[System.String, mscorlib, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b77a5c561934e089]]

content.7/f Maru 1000/p Maru: Hospital_Ambient/-1000 -1000/farmer -10000 -10000 0 Maru 9 15 3 Harvey 7 10 0/skippable/changeSprite Maru Hospital/changePortrait Maru Hospital/showFrame Maru 18/viewport 10 15/pause 4000/speak Maru "*叹息*……我对于准备这些样本很不在行……$s"/pause 2000/playSound doorClose/warp farmer 10 19/pause 100/playSound throw/showFrame Maru 17/shake Maru 2000/jump Maru/specificTemporarySprite maruBeaker/move farmer 0 -1 0/pause 1250/showFrame Maru 0/faceDirection Maru 2/pause 100/speak Maru "啊！糟糕！$4"/pause 600/showFrame Maru 16/pause 1000/speak Maru "整份样本都被毁了……哈维会把我杀了……$s"/pause 600/showFrame Maru 0/faceDirection Maru 0/pause 1500/faceDirection Maru 2/pause 400/speak Maru "$q 38 null#@，我应该怎么办？#$r 38 -50 Event_Hospital_1#从地板上铲起来就好。他不会发现的。#$r 39 -20 Event_Hospital_2#告诉哈维是我的错。#$r 38 50 Event_Hospital_3#告诉哈维，这纯属意外。"/move Harvey 3 0 2/move Harvey 0 2 2/doAction 10 13/move Harvey 0 1 2/faceDirection Maru 1/speak Harvey "发生了什么？我听到东西打碎的声音。"/pause 500/speak Maru "$p 38#我不小心摔碎了一份样本……真是对不起。$s|@进来后猛地一关门，吓得我打碎了一份样本。$u"/fork toldTruth/move Harvey 0 2 3/emote Harvey 40/speak Harvey "玛鲁，你不能把自己的问题推卸到别人身上。$a"/pause 300/faceDirection Harvey 1/speak Harvey "*唉*……我只好让病人再来采集一次样本了。$s#$b#这很可能会害得我们又亏损一个月……$s"/pause 600/faceDirection Maru 2/pause 1000/showFrame Maru 16/pause 500/emote farmer 28/end
content.toldTruth: move Harvey 0 2 3/speak Harvey "玛鲁，谢谢你告诉我事实真相。#$b#不用担心样本的事情，我们会再采集一份。"/pause 500/emote Harvey 32/pause 500/speak Maru "谢谢你对我的包容，哈维医生。"/pause 500/speak Harvey "当然……你在这儿帮了我不少忙。没有你，我都不知道该怎么办！"/pause 500/emote Maru 32/pause 1000/faceDirection Harvey 2/pause 500/emote Harvey 8/speak Harvey "@？你的脸色有些苍白……你还好吗？"/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 2/emote farmer 28/end
content.57/f Harvey 1000/p Harvey: sweet/-100 -100/farmer 10 19 0 Harvey 9 14 3/skippable/doAction 10 13/viewport 10 14/move farmer 0 -2 0/pause 300/faceDirection Harvey 2/speak Harvey "@！我正要给你写信呢。"/faceDirection farmer 0/emote farmer 8/speak Harvey "我的记录显示，你该进行一年一度的体检了！"/emote farmer 28/speak Harvey "现在就开始吧……用不着担心。一下下就好，一点儿也不疼。请跟我来。"/pause 600/advancedMove Harvey false 1 0 0 -4 -5 0/move farmer 0 -7 0 false/move farmer -4 0 3 true/viewport move -1 -2 4500/proceedPosition Harvey 5 10/doAction 5 9/move Harvey 0 -5 2 false/move farmer -1 0 0 false/move farmer 0 -4 0 false/pause 500/speak Harvey "嗯……好。请待着别动。"/pause 2000/speak Harvey "说“啊啊啊……”"/pause 500/speak Harvey "好，可以啦。"/pause 600/move Harvey -1 0 0/pause 1000/showFrame Harvey 19/playSound openBox/pause 1000/showFrame Harvey 8/move Harvey 0 1 1/faceDirection farmer 3/speak Harvey "我只要检查一下你的重要器官。"/pause 800/animate Harvey false true 100 4 5 6 7/positionOffset Harvey 2 0/pause 50/positionOffset Harvey 2 0/pause 50/positionOffset Harvey 2 2/pause 50/positionOffset Harvey 2 2/pause 50/positionOffset Harvey 2 2/pause 50/positionOffset Harvey 2 2/pause 50/positionOffset Harvey 2 2/pause 50/positionOffset Harvey 2 2/pause 50/stopAnimation Harvey/showFrame Harvey 20/pause 150/showFrame Harvey 21/pause 1500/speak Harvey "$q 86 null#嗯……你的心跳有点儿快。$u#$r 86 20 event_heart1#我有点紧张。#$r 86 20 event_heart2#我刚才在农场里干活，现在还没喘过来气。#$r 86 -50 event_heart3#你真的是医生吗？我的心跳很正常！"/pause 800/showFrame Harvey 20/pause 150/showFrame Harvey 4/animate Harvey false true 100 7 6 5 4/positionOffset Harvey -2 0/pause 50/positionOffset Harvey -2 0/pause 50/positionOffset Harvey -2 0/pause 50/positionOffset Harvey -2 0/pause 50/positionOffset Harvey -2 0/pause 50/positionOffset Harvey -2 0/pause 50/positionOffset Harvey -2 0/pause 50/positionOffset Harvey -2 0/pause 50/stopAnimation Harvey/pause 1300/speak Harvey "好啦！看来你身体很好，@。#$b#只要当心干活儿别太累着就好！"/emote farmer 32/pause 800/move farmer 0 1 2 true/faceDirection Harvey 2 true/move farmer 0 1 2/speak Harvey "感谢你来就诊。$h"/faceDirection farmer 0 true/end
content.571102/f Harvey 2000: Hospital_Ambient/-100 -100/farmer -200 -2000 0 Harvey 4 5 0/skippable/changeLocation HarveyRoom/showFrame Harvey 23/viewport 5 6 true/pause 1000/speak Harvey "喂？喂？有谁在吗？$9"/pause 1300/emote Harvey 40/speak Harvey "我是 H 医生……这里是北纬 52 度东经 43.5 度……正在进行无线电呼叫……有人听到吗？$9"/pause 2000/emote Harvey 40/pause 700/playSound newArtifact/message "收到……地面的 H 医生……这里是黑鸟 55Z。有事汇报吗？"/showFrame Harvey 28/jump Harvey/pause 800/speak Harvey "真有人听到了吗！？$10#$b#地面情报汇报：风速 3KPH，风向西偏北 36 度。地面温度 42 度。湿度 53%。H 医生通话结束！$10"/pause 300/playMusic kindadumbautumn/faceDirection Harvey 1 true/move Harvey 2 0 1/speak Harvey "啊，我的脉搏在上升……$7"/pause 400/playSound doorClose/warp farmer 6 12/move farmer 0 -3 0/faceDirection Harvey 2/speak Harvey "@！"/question fork1 "#询问哈维他为何那么紧张。#假装一切正常。"/fork normal/pause 500/speak Harvey "啊，我正在进行无线电通讯……而我居然遇到了真正的飞行员！"/emote Harvey 16/speak Harvey "现在应该就能看到他从我们头顶飞过！"/move Harvey 0 1 3/move Harvey -3 0 0/move Harvey 0 -2 0/speak Harvey "快点，快过来！"/speed farmer 4/move farmer 0 -3 3/speed farmer 4/move farmer -4 0 0/speed farmer 4/move farmer 0 -2 0/speed farmer 4/speak Harvey "快看！"/globalFade/cutscene plane/viewport -1000 -1000/speak Harvey "小时候，我的梦想就是当飞行员。"/pause 1000/speak Harvey "但因为我视力不好，而且极度恐高，这个梦想已经渐渐暗淡了。$s"/faceDirection Harvey 3/faceDirection farmer 1/viewport 5 6 true/pause 1600/emote farmer 28/speak Harvey "没事的……不用替我遗憾。#$b#我长大了，能接受自己人生的定位了。不是所有人都能实现梦想的……人生就是这样的。"/pause 1600/speak Harvey "嘿，你来看看我的飞机模型。我刚刚完成新的 TR-星鸟豪华版。$h"/advancedMove Harvey false 0 2 16 0/faceDirection farmer 2/globalFade .003/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 500/end
content.PlayerKilled: none/-100 -100/farmer 20 12 2 Harvey 21 12 3/pause 1500/showFrame 5/message "……{0}？"/pause 1000/message "好了，放轻松……慢慢来。"/viewport 20 12 true/pause 1000/speak Harvey "有人发现你不省人事地倒在地上……所以我给你做了紧急手术！#$b#下次小心点，好吗？$s"/showFrame 0/pause 1000/emote farmer 28/hospitaldeath/end
